body:
The latest build on OSX fails on Travis, because of a conflict when concretizing `mpileaks`:
```console
1. "%clang" conflicts with "elfutils"
```

### Expected Result

`mpileaks` concretize correctly on OSX

### Actual Result

See [here](https://travis-ci.org/spack/spack/jobs/357873755) for an example of a failed build.
title: OSX build is failing on Travis
